title: Eddy Merckx Collaborated with a Juice Box Brand for Its New All-Road Bike – Wait, What?
content:
This limited edition all-road bike and jersey collaboration comes to support children's charity.

Read the full article at Eddy Merckx Collaborated with a Juice Box Brand for Its New All-Road Bike – Wait, What? on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
